author: abayer
msg: FLUME-595: Node can fork multiple drivers from subsequent heartbeats when there only should be one.
- Update test sink to let it through interrupted
- Fix Liveness so that it does not hang
From: Jonathan Hsieh <jon@cloudera.com>

author: abayer
msg: FLUME-589: Improve Cancellation to take advantage of InterruptedException
- tests for interruption handling in backoff failover sinks
- tests for interruption handling in insistent open decorator
- tests for interruption handling in insistent append decorator
- tests for interruption handling in stubborn append sink
From: Jonathan Hsieh <jon@cloudera.com>

author: abayer
msg: FLUME-596: Simplify driver by removing unneeded DriverListener
From: Jonathan Hsieh <jon@cloudera.com>

author: abayer
msg: FLUME-593: Node should should only spawn logical node specified on master
- Previously, node would always spawn a null|null node and spawn a separate thread to reconfigure.  This update takes advantage of new driver semantics and removes this source of non-determinism.
From: Jonathan Hsieh <jon@cloudera.com>

author: abayer
msg: FLUME-569: Make Drivers handle source/sink open and close lifecycle
- Remove extra lazy openers since open moved into proper thread.
- Remove Shared WalManager test cases
- updated reporting to fix TestNodeJersey
- change from NodeState to DriverSate.
From: Jonathan Hsieh <jon@cloudera.com>
